name: Dell Webcam Central Application Configuration File
summary: Learn about .VNI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VNI files have the name App.vni.

description: Settings file used by Dell Webcam Central, a program used for video chatting; saved in plain text and contains application configuration settings; specifies plugins, as well as video chatting effects and bit rate recording settings.
